markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Summons](/Feats.aspx?ID=4721) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 129 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can call the elements to you. You can spend 10 minutes in concert with nature to replace a spell you’ve prepared in one of your druid spell slots with a summon elemental spell of the same rank.
name: Elemental Summons
